value.string: Logger task for Curiosity MI tool.
This task should be once for each transaction, after the transaction is complete.
pLineOfBusiness (mandatory): Centrica business unit the bot runs for
pOperatorName (mandatory): Partner/entity that operates the bot
pResult (mandatory): Success | Technical Exception | Business Exception
pOperatingFunction (mandatory): Operating Function for which the bot works (must be an actually existing Operating Function for the Line of Business).
Thread name - optional, but if it exists must not be longer than max length
Transaction ID - optional, but if it exists must not be longer than max length
Metadata 1 - optional, but if it exists must not be longer than max length
Metadata 2 - optional, but if it exists must not be longer than max length
Further parameters we can derive ourselves
"Token" parameter reflects environment: RJ19 = Run, CJ19 = Create
We determine which env we are in by looking at the CR URL
We lowercase the URL and remove / chars in case user has entered in the URL in caps or with extra /s.
vToken is set to the production value by default. Set to the create value here if we are connected to a create Control Room.
*** Note: create CR list will need to be maintained. Would ideally be in the Credential Vault but don't want that dependency. ***
If web service call failed, wait 2 seconds and retry once (in case problem was transient), then give up.
S3 TODO: more sophisticated retry schedule

value.expression:
Web service call failed: $Error-Description$
Repeated failure. Will not retry again.
$Error-Description$ Exception occurred at line number $Error-LineNumber.Number:toString$. You chose to mark the bot as 'Failed' in case of any encountered errors.
